rooms.name: Deluxe Room Queen Bed (23sqm)
rooms.description: Nothing lulls one into slumber quite so effortlessly as our Deluxe Rooms' uber beding experience. This room includes complimentary WIFI access, unlimited local calls and minibar (replenished once daily). There is no capacity for Extra Bed.

selloptions.name: Flash Deal
selloptions.dec:
Flash Deal - 20% discount on Best Available Rate.
Limited Offer valid for stay from 10 March to 31 May 2017.
Complimentary Breakfast (single or double occupancy) when you book direct ith us

selloptions.name: Best Available Rate
selloptions.dec:
- Free WIFI access
- Unlimited Local Calls
- Complimentary well-stocked Minibar(replenished once daily)

selloptions.name: Business @ Bay
selloptions.dec:
- Buffet breakfast for 2 persons 
- Free WIFI access and unlimited LocalCalls 
- Minibar (replenished once daily) 
- 2 pieces of Laundry Service daily perroom (Normal Service & Non-Accumulative) 
- An upgrade to Deluxe Room 
- Complimentary Parking

rooms.name: Deluxe Room King Bed (25sqm)
rooms.description: Our Deluxe King Rooms, well-equipped with all the functional comforts, offer you panoramic vistas over the swimming pool and the tranquil, hilly locale. You can recline in the plush leather armchair or luxe bedding to soak up the splendid scenary.

rooms.name: Deluxe Room 2 Single Beds (25sqm)
rooms.description: Our cosy Deluxe Twin Rooms give you ample room to share the dream space. Be it revelling in hillside splendour lazing in bed watching TV, or at the work desk surfing the Net, it is just perfectly designed for you and a companion
